ActCriminal Code
SubjectBlood Drug Concentration Regulations
PrecisOrder Creating the BLOOD DRUG CONCENTRATION REGULATIONS in order to give effect to the Actâ€™s criminal BLOOD DRUG CONCENTRATION OFFENCES. The Act also makes it easier to investigate and prosecute drug-impaired drivers and sends a clear message to the public about the dangers of mixing impairing drugs with driving.
